transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Hello good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon sir.
Executive: Hello
Executive: Meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan mam Sharda aap bol rahe ho mam ji hamare account manager.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir.

Executive: Hello
Executive: Ji mam.
Executive: Mam aawaz nahi aa rahi kya meri?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir a rahi hai.
Executive: Mam ye bol raha tha ki discussion hua tha sir se aapka?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir call aati hai mam.
Customer: Ab call aani start hui hai.
Executive: Ab call aani start ho gayi?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan kyunki mam do teen maine dekha ki do teen colle aayi thi abhi.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To uthai bhi gayi hai.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir maine attend ki thi wo.
Executive: To mam ye jo sim hai ye aapke paas hi rehta hai?
Customer: Haan mere wala jo hai.
Customer: Ye office ka number hai sir ye in par hota hai mere paas.
Executive: Nahi kyunki wohi cheez hai na kyunki sir mam bahut kam hi phone uthate hain. Jaise main sir se connect karta hu na.
Executive: To sir bahut.
Executive: Sir bahut kam hi phone uthate hain. To services aap hi dekhti hain mam iski IndiaMART ki?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir main hi dekhti hu aap mujhe contact karaya karo is number pe.
Executive: To mam ye present time humne itni kam bylead isme consume kiya hai.
Customer: Hello haan ji sir.
Executive: Mam hum bylead itna kam aaj kyun kiye?
Customer: Sir main samjhi nahi aapki baat.
Executive: Mam jo IndiaMART ke byleads hai na.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji sir.
Executive: To byleads hum itna kam kyun kar consume kar rahe hain?
Customer: Sir wo time ka issue rehta hai sir isliye.
Executive: Bhai mushkil se do se.
Customer: Main aapke matlab karungi regular.
Executive: Do se teen minute customer bylead consume kar lenge.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir tab tak to call nahi aati hai.
Executive: Jab teen meri baat hui hai aapse?
Customer: Jab do teen din pehle.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir main aayi thi.
Executive: Do teen din pehle aapse meri baat hui hai uske baad se maine dekha yaha pe aapne aaj bhi consume kiya bylead?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aur kal bhi kal bhi.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir main hai na darasal chutti par thi meri tabiyat nahi thi to ye jo IndiaMART hai wo yaha par PC par chalta hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To aur thoda sa ho gaya.
Customer: Ab to waise continue hai kal bhi ki thi maine aaj bhi.
Executive: Haan kal se to main dekh raha hu ki kal bhi aapne achhi khasi char panch bylead consume kari thi aur aaj bhi aapne char panch bylead hi consume kari hai. Un bylead pe mam kya response aa raha hai matlab ki kuch jo clients hai wo interested hai ya to kuch aur kuch bolte hain?
Customer: Nahi nahi sir kuch matlab koi achha response nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: To mostly kya response aata hai samne se?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Jab hum connect karte hain bylead pe.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To usme kya samne se bolte kya hai log?
Customer: Kya kehte hain?
Executive: Jaise hum kisi bylead pe connect kiya connect karne ke baad to unse puchte hain na ki sir aapki ye requirement thi aapko ye chahiye to wo kya bolte hain mostly?
Customer: Sir kehte hain ki requirement ke requirement ke bare mein puchte hain.
Executive: Quantity to mam yaha pe mention hoti hai jo unko quantity chahiye wo yaha pe already yaha pe mention hoti hai.
Customer: Haan wo to fir nahi bhi aati hai na.
Executive: To wo teen bylead jisme mention na ho. Mostly bylead pe kyunki teen teen se char cheeze hoti hain jo bylead pe hum dalte hain. Name ho gaya quantity ho gaya.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: To jaise present time pe yaha pe miniature relay socket MRS05 ek bylead aayi hai 5000 piece ki hai 5 se 10 lakh ka order hai ye aur uske baad ceiling fan down road and clamp ye 6000 piece ka order hai. Just to outdoor up down light ye 10000 piece ka order hai. Main yaha pe present time mam 10-10 lakh ki 12-12 lakh ki yaha pe bylead jo hai wo show ho rahi hai. Lekin hum usme mam kaun si bylead filter ka aapko maine bataya tha isse pehle connect kiya tha?
Executive: Kya kaha sir?
Executive: Filter ka maine aapko bataya tha?
Customer: No no sir.
Executive: To mam ek kaam kariye aap present time pe na main ek team share kar raha hu aap us pe aa jaiye main aapko filter ka bata deta hu ki kaha se hum badi bylead dekhte hain chhoti bylead pe dekhiye aap aise dhundte rahengi na bahut time lag jayega. Aapko kaise badi bylead pe connect karte hain wo main aapko bata deta hu. Theek hai aap ye do se teen minute ke liye share kar deta hu. Mostly aap to use karti hongi na aap?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan to aap share kar dete hain.

Customer: Hello

Customer: Sir aapki aawaz nahi clear aa rahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good responses on buyleads.

- Customer is consuming less number of buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to find bigger buyleads.

- Executive offered to share his screen to explain filter.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share his screen.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filter
